original_text: Then King Rehoboam sent Hadoram, who was taskmaster over the forced labor, and the people of Israel stoned him to death with stones. And King Rehoboam quickly mounted his chariot to flee to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕이 역꾼의 감독 하도람을 보냈더니 이스라엘 자손이 저를 돌로 쳐 죽인지라 르호보암 왕이 급히 수레에 올라 예루살렘으로 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: who was taskmaster over the forced labor
and the people of Israel stoned him to death with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 이스라엘 백성이 돌로 그를 쳐서 죽였다

sentences.original_text: And King Rehoboam quickly mounted his chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 르호보암 왕은 서둘러 전차에 올랐고
